name: 塞德里克·吉本森
awards: 1957年 第29届奥斯卡金像奖 黑白片最佳艺术指导和布景 回头是岸
1956年 第28届奥斯卡金像奖 黑白片最佳艺术指导和布景 (提名) 黑板丛林
1955年 第27届奥斯卡金像奖 黑白片最佳艺术指导和布景 (提名) 纵横天下
name_full: 塞德里克·吉本森 Cedric Gibbons
introduction: Austin Cedric Gibbons (March 23, 1893 – July 26, 1960) was an Irish American art director who was one of the most important and influential in the field in the history of American film. He also made a great impact on motion picture theater architecture through the 1930s to 1950s, the period considered the golden-era of theater architecture. He is credited as the designer of the Oscar statuette in 1928.
